fields.label: Divider
fields.name: divider
fields.instructions: Add a divider between title and subtitle

fields.label: Video
fields.name: video
fields.instructions: Add link for video for banner. You can find the link in the media library where the video is uploaded.

fields.label: Page Content
fields.name: page_content
fields.instructions: Add elements in any order you like to the page.

sub_fields.label: WYSIWYG Editor
sub_fields.name: wysiwyg_editor
sub_fields.instructions: Any content may be added in here including [shortcodes]

sub_fields.label: Header Large
sub_fields.name: header_large
sub_fields.instructions: Equivalent to h1 tag (important for SEO to have at least 1 on the page)

sub_fields.label: Header Color
sub_fields.name: header_color
sub_fields.instructions: Default is black, otherwise choose a color.

sub_fields.label: Header Medium
sub_fields.name: header_medium
sub_fields.instructions: Equivalent to h2 tag, smaller than h1

sub_fields.label: Header Color
sub_fields.name: header_color
sub_fields.instructions: Default is black, otherwise choose a color.

sub_fields.label: Header Small
sub_fields.name: header_small
sub_fields.instructions: Equivalent to h3 tag, smaller than h2

sub_fields.label: Header Color
sub_fields.name: header_color
sub_fields.instructions: Default is black, otherwise choose a color.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Add title for section

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: Add text

sub_fields.label: Title Color
sub_fields.name: title_color
sub_fields.instructions: Default is black, otherwise choose a color.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Add the image for the block

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Add title (optional)

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: Add the text for the section

sub_fields.label: Type of title tag
sub_fields.name: type_of_title_tag
sub_fields.instructions: Select the type of tag to use. If it's the main focus of the page, h1 is appropriate. If it is still very important but not the main focus of the page, h2 or h3 may be more appropriate (This also effects size). More info here https://www.hobo-web.co.uk/headers/

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Add title for video (optional)

sub_fields.label: Section Video
sub_fields.name: section_video
sub_fields.instructions: Add video

sub_fields.label: Caption
sub_fields.name: caption
sub_fields.instructions: Add caption for video (optional)

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Add image for hero (appears in the middle)

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: background_image
sub_fields.instructions: This image will span the background

sub_fields.label: Title Large
sub_fields.name: title_large
sub_fields.instructions: Large title will be an h1 (this should be used mainly if it is at the top of the page)

sub_fields.label: Title Small
sub_fields.name: title_small
sub_fields.instructions: Add title for hero but it will be an h2 tag so a bit smaller.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: Add text for header

sub_fields.name: column
sub_fields.instructions: Add items for 1 column

sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Adds a title for the column

sub_fields.label: Main Image
sub_fields.name: main_image
sub_fields.instructions: Add main image for column

sub_fields.instructions: Adds text for column

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: icon
sub_fields.instructions: Add OPTIONAL icon class (font awesome). For instance, type in "fa-user" or "fa-chevron-down"

sub_fields.label: Link
sub_fields.name: link
sub_fields.instructions: This will wrap any image or title in a link to your desired location
